#######################################################
#	Notes:
#
# 	All these places attempt to use oldest name for
#	each region.
#
#	Also, for the earliest release, I am including
#	only the most basic requirements.
#
########################################################

#Pretani
colonial_pretani = {
	color = { 187 34 0 }
	provinces = {

		4380 
	}
}
